text: Magudikkaran () is a 1994 Tamil drama film directed by Yaar Kannan. The film features Sarath Kumar in a guest appearance, while newcomers Dev Anand, Devi and Chithra play the lead roles. The film, produced by Subbiah, had musical score by Deva and was released on 25 November 1994.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8SgkOSZZqBghttp://www.in.com/tv/movies/jaya- movie-221/magudikkaran-34577.html ==Cast== *Sarath Kumar as Raja's father (guest appearance) *Chithra as Thangam *Dev Anand as Raja *Devi *Anandaraj *Senthil *K. Prabhakaran *Vijay Krishnaraj *Pradeep Jupiter *Jeevan *Nasim ==Soundtrack== The film score and the soundtrack were composed by film composer Deva. The soundtrack released in 1994. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! Track !! Song !! Singer(s) !!
